meanings: (사람이) cry (over/about), weep, (큰 소리로) howl, bawl, wail

vlive.korean: 그러면 울면서 달려올 줄 알았냐? Did you expect her to cry? 듣기 View video Dingo Freestyle / 딩고프리스타일 : ★선공개★ EP.09 만취 다모임의 못 말리는 회식! 토크 수위 괜찮을까? ㅣ둘도없는힙합친구 : 다모임ㅣDingo Freestyle
vlive.english: Did you expect her to cry?

vlive.korean: 울면서 인사해야 해, 오늘? Should we be crying while we say hello? 듣기 View video ITZY : 기분 좋은 ITZY♥️👍🏼
vlive.english: Should we be crying while we say hello?

vlive.korean: [울 따나 라바 옐로우 닮았단 소식에 옐로우 울면서 집에 갔어] 라바! [Larva Yellow cried after hearing this] Larva! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [ASTRO] 한강공원에서 농구..🏀 이 청춘영화를 칸으로..🌟 (Eunwoo&Bin talking about drama character)
vlive.english: [Larva Yellow cried after hearing this] Larva!

vlive.korean: [난 심심하면 울 와기고양이 사진보다가 울면서 코 푼다고] 나형을 풀다니! [When I'm bored, I look at photo of them and cry and blow my nose] Solving section Na! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SF9] 나 기원전 00년생인데 0304형아즈 귀여워서 혼절해따,,(º﹃º):.♡* (SF9 talking about their cute episode)
vlive.english: [When I'm bored, I look at photo of them and cry and blow my nose] Solving section Na!

vlive.korean: 제가 30분 뒤부터 끝날 때까지 울면서 봤던 영화거든요. That's a movie where I cried while watching the last 30 minutes. 듣기 View video INFINITE : [FULL] JANG DONG WOO 1ST MINI ALBUM [Bye] COMEBACK SHOWCASE
vlive.english: That's a movie where I cried while watching the last 30 minutes.

examples.korean: in tears 듣기 Add to Wordbook 울면서. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
She left the room in tears. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 눈물을 흘리며[울면서] 그 방을 떠났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She left the room in tears. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: So after shouting and screaming for an hour she walked out in tears. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그렇게 한 시간 동안 악을 쓰고 비명을 질러 댄 후 그녀는 울면서 걸어 나갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: So after shouting and screaming for an hour she walked out in tears. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She went upstairs crying. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 울면서 위층으로 올라갔다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: She went upstairs crying. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: That movie was moving, so I was craughing. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 영화는 정말 감동적이어서 나는 울면서 웃었다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
